item.title: Report X-2024081411
item.description:
Report X-2024081411

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024081411-The box has no markings on it. The box contains a N232404980 Drivers front airbag. The barcode is using a hazmat service code that is flagging the package to have HAP done on it. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP and not origin station. This is an undeclared hazmat. X-2024081412-This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains an N232404980 Driver Front Airbag Inflator. The barcode is using a hazmat service code and is asking for HAP to be done. No hazmat certification or OP-900. Unable to pass HAP. Not origin station.

item.title: Report X-2024081367
item.description:
Report X-2024081367

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This is an undeclared hazmat. The shipper covered up the limited quantity diamond with the barcode. The box contains 6X1gal bottles of Champion Windshield Wash & Deicer -20. This was also damaged. 1X1gal bottle had a loose cap and the seal under the cap is broken allowing it to leak. The other bottles are soiled from leakage.
